DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immunogenicity different combination A/H1N1 S-OIV ( swine flu ) vaccine healthy young child .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity A/H1N1-SOIV ( Swine Flu ) Vaccine With Without Adjuvant Children ( 3 < 9 Years )
DOC.criteria: Children 3 < 9 year age good health determine medical history , physical assessment clinical judgement investigator without influenza within past 6 month . History serious disease . History serious reaction follow administration vaccine hypersensitivity vaccine component . Known suspect impairment/alteration immune function . Receipt plan receipt seasonal trivalent influenza vaccine within 1 week study vaccination . For additional entry criterion , please refer protocol .
